DOC.detailed_description: The OHIP 49 administer pre-treatment ( edentulous condition ) visit ( i.e. , newly fabricate conventional denture , conversion 4 implant retain overdenture finally 4 implant retain palateless overdenture ) . Participants interim denture fabricate worn 10-12 week . During time , participant 4 implant place continue wear interim denture . At 8 week implant placement , participant locator attachment place implant interim denture snap place , term 'overdenture . ' After 10-12 week wear overdenture , patient receive new denture , term 'final palateless overdenture , ' consist denture snap 4 implant without palate . Participants evaluate 10-12 week followup insertion prosthesis . Participants complete questionnaire stage treatment . Estimated duration patient participation approximately 8 month ( 31weeks ) understand flexibility base laboratory fabricate denture frameworks adjustment need approval esthetic .
DOC.criteria: Capable give informed consent Able willing follow study procedure instruction In good general health Edentulous maxillary arch period least 6 month Have adequate bone volume present place four maxillary implant without necessity sinus augmentation hard soft tissue grafting ( determine investigator follow panoramic radiograph acquisition ) ASA ( American Society Anesthesiologists ) Class 3+ Immunocompromised ( Including HIV infection ) Current drug abuse ( selfreported part School Dentistry health history Pregnant plan pregnant point trial History IV oral bisphosphonate use contraindicate dental implant therapy Chronic disease oral manifestation Exhibit Oral pathology Ongoing medication initiate less three month prior enrollment ( medication chronic medical condition must initiate least three month prior enrollment . ) Smoker within past 6 month Diabetes Known allergy material use denture fabrication implant surgery
